summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North Forty-sixth Street, from Fremont Avenue to Palatine Avenue; Palatine Avenue from North Forty-sixth Street to North Forty-seventh Street; North Forty-seventh Street, North Forty-eighth Street and North Forty-ninth Street, each from Fremont Avenue to First Avenue Northwest; North Fiftieth Street, from Greenwood Avenue to First Avenue Northwest; and First Avenue Northwest, from North Forty-seventh Street to North Fiftieth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks thereon, all in accordance with Resolution No. 1806 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
